name: International Consortium of Research Staff Associations
goal:
Vision: ICORSA envisions a global community of internationally networked researchers, where researchers establish a collective voice to influence international policy, and to ensure that researchers’ contributions are recognised and fairly rewarded through sustainable careers.

Mission: ICORSA is a collaborative organisation that links communities of researchers’ organisations worldwide in order to address common challenges shared by an international research workforce. To that end, ICORSA seeks to build a shared repository of effective and fair researcher working practices, inform international research policy and develop researcher communities worldwide.
interests: Education and training, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: All research policy initiatives, in particular relating to research careers (e.g., Charter and Code for Researchers, Human Resource Strategy for Researchers, RESAVER)
